title: How to Hide a Tinder Profile

steps.title: Open Tinder.
steps.content: Open Tinder. This app icon looks like a white flame on a red/pink background that you'll find on your Home screen, in the app drawer, or by searching. You can also go to https://tinder.com and follow the same steps to hide your Tinder profile. If you aren't logged in, select a login option when prompted, then enter your account details to log in.

steps.title: Tap the profile icon.
steps.content: Tap the profile icon. It's the person-shaped icon in the upper left corner of the screen. A menu will appear.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This grey gear icon is usually on the left side of the page.

steps.title: Tap to turn the switch off next to "Show me on Tinder.
steps.content: Tap to turn the switch off next to "Show me on Tinder. " The switch should change from pink/red to grey/white to indicate that it is off. Your profile will not appear in the card stack for other users, but you can still use the app and your account to message your current matches. [1] X Research source
